subject: Biology
text: The photomicrograph shows some human blood cells

original_question.question_text: The photomicrograph shows some human blood cells

difficulty.justification: Requires observation skills, drawing skills and calculation of magnification

sub_questions.text: Make a large drawing of the cell labelled C
Complete the table by describing three visible differences between cell C and cell D
Draw line E-F, measure lengths and calculate magnification

tables.description: Table for comparing cells C and D
